isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - INSTALL - AUXILIARY COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES

step1.para: Seat the countershaft rear bearings in the auxiliary housing, snap ring toward the rear ( Figure 187).

figure.caption: Figure 187. Seat Countershaft Rear Bearings in Auxiliary Housing

step1.para: Install the speedometer gear washer, with flat side to the rear and the speedometer gear or replacement spacer on the output shaft and against the washer ( Figure 188).

figure.caption: Figure 188. Install Speedometer Gear or Replacement Spacer on Output Shaft

step1.para: Install the oil seal in the bearing cover, lip of the seal to the rear ( inset, Figure 189). Install the gasket and rear bearing cover with mechanical speedometer bore up to the left. Position bolts in proper location and tighten to recommended torque.

figure.caption: Figure 189. Install Oil Seal and Install Gasket and Rear Bearing Cover

note.para: Use the proper seal driver to install the seal. Install the gasket and rear bearing cover with mechanical speedometer bore up to the left. Position bolts in the proper location and tighten to recommended torque.

step1.para: As the countershafts are installed, mesh the marked reduction gear tooth on each countershaft set of gear teeth marked ( Figure 190). With countershafts positioned and timed, drive the countershafts into the bearings. Seat securely.

figure.caption: Figure 190. Mesh Marked Reduction Gear Tooth With Marked Gear Teeth

step1.para: Install the bearing on the front of the output shaft, chamfered side of the race to the rear ( Figure 191).

figure.caption: Figure 191. Install Bearing on Front of Output Shaft
